title: WestDRI
description: |
  <br>WestDRI (Digital Research Infrastructure for western Canada) offers training in advanced research computing for researchers at Canadian post-secondary institutions. We are based at [Simon Fraser University](https://www.sfu.ca/) and work in collaboration with other universities from British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba under the umbrella of the [Digital Research Alliance of Canada](https://alliancecan.ca/).
